x x x x x x x x x x x x x x
ša₂-ak-na x x ša₂ a-na x x x x
ap-lu-ha-nu de-ke-e x x x
na-as₂-pan-tu₂ šu-tam-hu-ṣa-at x x
an-qu-lu na-pi-ih-te-šu x x
ana er-bet-ti IM-MEŠ me-hu-u šu-x x
{giš}TUKUL-MEŠ ut-ta-ʾe-ru ṣu-lul hur-ba-šu
zu-ʾu-u-ut tam-ha-ru ir-ta-mu-ku ki-lal-la-an
i-na-ah-ma an-zu-u₂ ina mit-hur me-he-e a-par-šu₂ id-di
il-qe₂-e-ma be-lum ina ar₂-kat₃ šu-uk-di-šu₂
u₂-nak-kis ab-re-e-šu₂ im-na u šu-me-la u₂-ra-ʾi-im
iṭ-ṭul-ma kap-pa-šu it-ba-la zik-ri pi-i-šu₂
kap-pa ana kap-pa ki-i il-su-u qa-nu-u i-še-ʾa₄-aš₂-šu₂
šil-ta-hu i-bi-ra bu-un lib₃-bi-šu
ab-ru kap-pu u₂-še-bi-ra šu-ku-da
lib₃-ba u ha-še-e i-bir šil-ta-hu
i-nar hur-sa-a-ni qer-bi-su-nu u₂-dal-lih ir-hi-iṣ
{d}NIN.URTA i-nar hur-sa-a-ni qer-bit-su-nu u₂-dal-lih ir-hi-iṣ
ir-hi-iṣ uz₂-zu-uš-šu₂ KI{+tu₂} ra-pa-aš₂-tu₂
ir-hi-iṣ qe₂-reb hur-sa-a-ni lem-na an-za-a i-nar-ma
qar-ra-du {d}MAŠ DUB NAM.TAR-MEŠ DINGIR.DINGIR qa-tuš-šu₂ ut-tir
ana it-ti ša₂ bu-us-ra-ti-šu₂
kap-pi an-zi-i u₂-bil ša₂-a-ru
i-mur-ma it-ta-šu₂ {d}da-gan ih-du
is-si-ma nap-har DINGIR-MEŠ ha-diš i-zak-kar
dan-nu-um-ma ut-ta-ʾa-ar an-za-a šad-du-su
kak-ki DINGIR-MEŠ {d}a-num u {d}da-gan qa-tuš-šu₂ ut-tir
a-lik-šu-ma lil-lik-an-na-a-ši
lih-di lim-mi-lil ni-gu-ta li-pu-uš
li-ziz KI DINGIR-MEŠ ŠEŠ-MEŠ-šu₂-ma pi-riš-tu₂ liš-me
liš-me-ma ša₂ DINGIR-MEŠ pi-riš-tu₂
ina a-nun-na-ku KI DINGIR.DINGIR ŠEŠ-MEŠ-šu₂-ma li-qis-su par-ṣi
{d}x pi-i-šu₂ DU₃-ma i-qab-bi
a-na {d}da-gan INIM MU{+ar₂}
ina ta-bak A-MEŠ ki-ša₂-di ki-i ku-ṣu maš-ku il-qe₂
ki-ma ina qe₂-reb hur-sa-a-ni lem-na an-za-a i-nar-ru
qar-ra-du {d}MAŠ DUB NAM.TAR-MEŠ DINGIR.DINGIR qa-tuš-šu₂ ut-tir
šup-ra-aš₂-šum-ma lil-li-ka-ak-ka
DUB NAM.TAR-MEŠ liš-ku-na ina bur-ki-ka
{d}EN.LIL₂ KA-šu₂ DU₃-ma i-qab-bi
ana {d}PA.TUG₂ SUKKAL-šu₂ INIM MU{+ar₂}
{d}PA.TUG₂ ṣi-i ka-me-taš
{d}bir-du šu-ri-ba ana IGI-ia
{d}PA.TUG₂ u-ṣi ka-me-taš
{d}bir-du ul-te-ri-ba ana mah-ri {d}BAD
{d}EN.LIL₂ KA-šu₂ DU₃-ma i-qab-bi
ana {d}bir-di INIM MU{+ar₂}
{d}bir-du lu-uš-pur-ka lu-x-x
""
{d}MAŠ pa-a-šu DU₃-ma i-qab-bi
a-na {d}bir-du a-ma-ta MU{+ar₂}
{d}bir-du a-na DINGIR be-li₂-ka
mi-na-a šam-riš tal-li-ka
{d}bir-du pa-a-šu i-pu-uš-ma i-qab-bi
a-na {d}MAŠ be-li₂-šu a-ma-ta i-zaq-qar
be-li a-na ka-a-ša₂ x x x
{d}EN.LIL₂ AD-ka iš-pu-ra-an-ni
um-ma-a iš-mu-u₂ DINGIR-MEŠ
ki-i ina qe₂-reb hur-sa-a-ni lem-na an-za-a tak-mu-u₂
ih-du-u₂ i-ri-šu u₃ i-li-iṣ kab-ta-su-nu
ina mah-ri-ka u₂-ša-li-ku-ni u₃ x x x
a-lik-šum-ma x x x x iš-x x x
li-ih-du x x x x x li x x x
li-is-x x x x x x x x
liš-mi-e ina E₂.KUR x x x x
x x x x x x x x x
{d}NIN.URTA KA-šu i-pu-šam-ma a-na {d}bir-du i-qab-bi
mi-na-a taš-x x x x x x
ki-i ša₂ ma-x x x x x x x
DUB NAM.TAR-MEŠ-ma u₂-x x x x x x x
mi-na-a x x x x x x
x x x x-ma a-šak-kan x x x x x
x x x x pa-ni-ia x x x
""
x x x x x x x x a-a ib-ba-ni
x x x x x x x x an-zi-i ina E₂.KUR
x x x it-ta-šu₂ ša₂ qar-ra-di
ina nar-bi dan-nu-ti-šu₂ lem-na an-za-a lit-ta-aṭ-ṭal
qar-ra-du ina dan-nu-ti-ka KUR{+e} ta-nar-ru
tak-me an-za-a ta-nar-ra dan-nu-us-su
mu-up-par-ša₂ an-za-a ta-nar-ra dan-nu-us-su
aš₂-šu taq-tar-du-ma KUR{+e} ta-na-ru
kul-lat na-ki-ri tu-šak-ni-ša₂ ana GIR₃-MIN AD-ka {d}BAD
{d}NIN.URTA aš₂-šu taq-tar-du-ma KUR{+e} ta-nar-ru
kul-lat na-ki-ri tu-šak-ni-ša₂ ana GIR₃-MIN AD-ka {d}EN.LIL₂
be₂-lu-ta tag-da-mar kul-lat gim-ri par-ṣi
man-nu ša₂ ki-ma ka-a-ta ib-ba-nu-u pa-ra-aṣ KUR
nar-bu šar-ku-ka pa-rak DINGIR-MEŠ ši-ma-a-ti
{d}NISABA im-bu-u šu-luh-u₂-ka
MU-ka ina AB.SIN₂ im-bu-u {d}NIN.GIR₂.SU
uš-ma-an-du-ka re-ʾu-ut UN-MEŠ ga-mir-tu₂
MU-ka ra-bi-iṣ {giš}GU.ZA id-di-nu ana LUGAL{+u₂-ti}
id-di-nu MU-ka ina {kur}e-la-ma-ti {d}hu-rab-til
ina {iri}MUŠ₃.ŠEŠ₂ {d}MUŠ₃.ŠEŠ₂ i-qab-bu-ka
MU-ka ina E₂-i-bi₂-{d}a-num id-di-nu EN AD.HAL
x x x x x-ka ina DINGIR.DINGIR ŠEŠ-MEŠ-ka
x x x x x x x AD-ka
x x x x x a-lak mah-ri
MU-ka {d}PA.BIL.SAG id-di-nu ina E₂.GAL.MAH
MU-ka {d}x im-bu-u ina ŠEŠ.UNUG{ki}
MU-ka {d}NIN.A.ZU id-di-nu ina E₂.KUR.MAH
x x-nu-ka i-lit-ta-ka {d}DUR.AN.KI
ina BAD₃.AN{ki} {d}KA.DI i-qab-bu-ka
x x x {d}za-ba₄-ba₄
x x i-nam-bu-u zi-kir-šu₂
x x {d}BAD UGU ka-la DINGIR-MEŠ qar-ra-du-ut-ka
x x ša₂ šu-tu-ur DINGIR{+ti}-ka
x x x-iš ad-lul-ka
MU-ka i-na {iri}NI.ŠUR id-di-nu {d}LUGAL.BAN₃.DA
MU-ka {d}LUGAL.MARAD.DA id-di-nu ina E₂.GIŠ.KALAM.MA
MU-ka i-na E₂.SIKIL.LA id-di-nu UR.SAG {d}TIŠPAK
x x x ina {iri}bu-be₂-e ina E₂.NIM.MA.AN.KU₃
MU-ka {d}MES.SAG.UNUG{ki} im-bu-u ina KUL.UNUG{ki}
x x x-qur {d}be-let-i₃-li₂ AMA-ka
x x MU-ka EN pu-lu-uk-ki
x x x {d}PAB.NIGIN₃.GAR.RA
x x ina KUR im-bu-u
x x-ka {d}PAB.SUKKAL a-lik mah-ri
pal-hu šu-tu-ru ina DINGIR-MEŠ MU-MEŠ-ka ma-aʾ-diš
EN pak-ka-ta-ma le-ʾa-a-ta ra-šub-ba-ta
x x-ka {d}NIN.ŠI.KU₃ {d}60 AD-ka
x x x KUR qab-li u ša₂-aš-me
x x x-ti-ir E₂ pa-re-e iš-ruk-ka
x x x KUR-MEŠ-šu₂-nu im-bi-ka
x x x x-ma ina E₂.KUR-ri
x x x x-ti par-ṣi
x x x {mul}UR.GU.LA
x x x x-ul A₂-KAR₂ NU ŠE.GA
